column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Asami says : " If we do n't find Wu soon , we might never find him . "
#Text=Korra says : " He 's on that train ! "
#Text=Mako says : " How do you know for sure he 's here ? "
#Text=Korra says : " I do n't .
#Text=" Korra says : " You would n't have to if you had guarded the prince like you were supposed to .
#Text=" Mako says : " Oh , so it 's my fault Wu disappeared .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's certainly not mine !
#Text=" Asami says : " Guys , shh .
#Text=Listen .
#Text=" Mako says : " Wu !
#Text=Wu , it 's me .
#Text=" Wu says : " Mako ?
#Text=Where am I ?
#Text=Am I dead ?
#Text=" Mako says : " No , you 're on a train .
#Text=We 're gon na get you out of here .
#Text=" Korra says : " Everyone out .
#Text=" Wu says : " I 'm not going up there .
#Text=" Korra says : " Jump !
#Text=" Mako says : " You all right ?
#Text=" Wu says : " Yes !
#Text=Thank you , thank you , thank you , thank you , thank you , thank you , thank you , thank you , thank you .
#Text=You are definitely getting a raise , Buddy .
#Text=" Mako says : " You should be thanking Korra .
#Text=We never would have found you with out her .
#Text=" Wu says : " I owe you my life , Avatar .
#Text=If only there was some way to repay you .
#Text=Oh , I know .
#Text=How about I take you out for a night on the town ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Really ?
#Text=You 're asking me out right now ?
#Text=" Wu says : " So ... I put you down for a " maybe " ?
#Text=" Korra says : " How about a never ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Not exactly what I imagined for our first day back together .
#Text=" Asami says : " But it was kind of like old times .
#Text=Except for the getting on each other 's nerves part .
#Text=" Mako says : " Actually , that is like old times for me and Korra .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry things got so tense earlier .
#Text=" Asami says : " It 's all right .
#Text=I guess after being apart for three years , there 's bound to be a bit of an adjustment period .
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah , but it 's great to have you back .
#Text=" Korra says : " There 's no place else I 'd rather be .
#Text=" Wu says : " You guys are the greatest friends a guy could have .
#Text=" Korra says : " So , what are we gon na do with him ?
#Text=It 's too dangerous to take him back to the hotel .
#Text=" Wu says : " Whoo !
#Text=You 're telling me !
#Text=I need a cushy safe house somewhere .
#Text=" Mako says : " I think I know just the place .
#Text=" Wu says : " Nice digs , Mako .
#Text=You did n't tell me you came from money .
#Text=" Mako says : " I do n't .
#Text=This is Asami 's place .
#Text=She was nice enough to let my family stay here after they fled Ba Sing Se .
#Text=" Yin says : " Mako !
#Text=It 's so wonderful to -- Are you ... " Mako says : " Grandma , this is Prince Wu .
#Text=He needs to stay with you and the family for a little while .
#Text=" Wu says : " It 's an honor , Grandma Mako .
#Text=" Mako says : " She loves royalty .
#Text=" Wu says : " I think I 'll fit right in here .
#Text=Thanks for looking out for me , Mako .
#Text=Now where 's the nearest bathroom ?
#Text=I have been holding it all day !
#Text="
